general.gigTitle: design and develop websites with wordpress elementor pro

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional WordPress Developer and Specialist in Bug fixing
sellerCard.description:
I'm Abir Hasan Himel, a professional web developer and WordPress expert with 6+ years of experience. I've worked with over (1k+) clients globally, solving a wide range of complex issues, bugs, and errors, and also built 50+ dynamic WordPress websites. My specialties include: 

Troubleshooting Any WordPress issues,
Fixing bugs,
Customizing premium themes (Divi, Elementor Pro, WP Bakery),
Website migration,
Malware removal,
Building websites from scratch with Elementor Pro/Divi,
Feel free to reach out anytime, and Iâ€™ll help resolve your issue quickly and efficiently!

description.content:
*****PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE PLACING AN ORDER *****


Hello there, are you looking for someone who can make you a professionally designed website for your company or personal/business use? Try me out, i will design and develop your website with WordPress elementor pro.


With over 6 years of professional experience and having successfully served more than (1k+) clients, I can assure you best quality work compare to others.


What's Included in this Gig :

======================

==> Custom designs with Elementor Pro.

==> Custom Typography Schema ( Fonts, Color, Button ).

==> Elementor Pro Licensee for 1 year ( Steller plus + Steller Business gig).

==> Responsive & Cross Browser Compatibility.

==> Easy Drag & Drop Customization.

==> Email SMTP Connection.

==> Social media & Contact form.

==> SEO Friendly Website.

==> Live Chat integration (Zendesk, HubSpot, LiveChat).

==> Website Loading Speed Optimization ( Steller plus + Steller Business gig).

==> WordFence Security Integration ( FREE ).



 My 3 promises to you :

====================

1. 100% user satisfaction.

2. Deliver the work on time.

3. Provide after-sale service.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Not Allowed Website to built
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Porn, Adult, Betting, Gambling, Drug, Hacking, Pirating are not allowed for this gig.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am ready to purchase! What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You would need a domain name and a hosting account (if you don't have these I will assist you).I will also need your logo, names & no. of pages, a few sentences about your website/company, e mail address to configure form, a few images from google (I will try to arrange similar ones).

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you setup domain and install wordpress too?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, i can also setup the domain on your hosting and install wordpress without an extra charges.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my website easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Your website will be fully editable! You will be able to very easily add text & images to all pages with a click! No programming skills required! :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: I like some websites, can you create something similar?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I believe I can clone any site using Elementor. You are highly welcome to share your ideas and thought in the inbox and get FREE Quote for custom design layout

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer HTML to WordPress conversion or PSD to WordPress conversion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide convert PSD, xd, ai, figma to wordpress using elementor pro. Check my other gigs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide Elementor Pro License
questionsAndAnswers.answer: yes only for my  ( Steller plus + Steller Business gig).

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can we create a custom offer if any package is not fit my requirements?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, We can because maybe it will happen your requirement will not fit in my any packages, in this case we will create a custom offer.

packageList.title: Stellar ||
packageList.description: 3 pages ( Home + About + Contact ) Full Mobile Responsive. Customized Header & Footer.

packageList.title: Stellar Plus  ||
packageList.description: 5 pages custom design Full Mobile Responsive + Email Setup + Blog + Optimization.

packageList.title: Stellar Business ||
packageList.description: 5-8  pages custom design+ Custom Typography + Ecommerce + Blog + Payment method integration.

milestones.title: Website Design
milestones.description: I'll create the design for your website.

steps.title: Onboarding Questionnaire
steps.description: You'll fill out a detailed questionnaire / brief.

steps.title: Video meetup
steps.description: We'll meet (Zoom) to discuss your project.

milestones.title: Progress check
milestones.description: We'll meet to review your project status and the steps needed to finish it.

milestones.title: First draft
milestones.description: I'll prepare a first draft of the delivery.

milestones.title: Modifications
milestones.description: I'll modify assets based on your feedback.

milestones.title: Final Design
milestones.description: I'll deliver the final website design for your approval.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment: It was a pleasure to work with Abir and he managed to incorporate all our whishes in the new website design.

seller_response.comment: Excellent experience. Very good communication. I would love to work with them again.

reviews.comment: So easy to work with and really detailed. Did everything I needed and nothing was a hassle - will definately use him again and highly recommend his services.Kee

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much. Will work again.

reviews.comment:
Abir is a very professional person.
He understood the need and worked on it easily and in a very short time. I recommend him

great work, fast and reliable. always present which is the most important thing for a client like me, having the dev present and fast to reply and fix and evaluate.
thank you, 
George
Very excellent service, I will always recommend his services. Communication is top notch

notableClients.name: IT Advo
notableClients.interaction_description: I have an opportunity to work on this site and my task was to redesign some inner page and the landing page. I have completed my job successful and my client was very satisfied with the end results.
